resources.string:
0 REM This app is designed to track your high scores from retro games 

1 REM It is useful especially for playing on real old computers and consoles, 

2 REM as often such software does not allow any other way to save your high score 

10 PRINT "Play your retro game" 

20 PRINT "get a HIGH SCORE" 

30 INPUT "Add a game and high score"; GAME$, SCO% 

40 REM You can add optional note and picture of title screen 

50 PRINT "Play again and beat your HIGH SCORE" 

60 INPUT "Update your HIGH SCORE"; SCO% 

70 GOTO 50
